title: After hours at JavaOne
body: One of the tragedies of having to work at this conference is that I have to be up and working at 8am tomorrow. This is a regular thing and really cramps the after hours activities. This evening I went out with the JPL folks for dinner and we had a great time. After we had finished eating a lovely dinner at LuLu, one of the JPL folks, Mark Indictor, pulled out his fiddle and started to play. He's really good. If any of you were in LuLu and heard him, you got quite a treat. He was just getting cranked up and I had to leave: I was (am!) falling over tired and I have be up early... A great day.
